title: A brand taken out of the fire. Or The Romish spider, with his webbe of treason. VVouen and broken together with the seuerall vses that the world and Church shall make thereof. By T. Cooper, preacher of Gods word.
author: Cooper, Thomas, fl. 1626.
publisher: Printed by G. Eld [and Thomas Purfoot] for Iohn Hodgets, and are to be sould at his shop in Paules Church-yeard,
